name: Ectoplasmic Shaping
description: Shape and mold ectoplasm, or create Open Condition on an object or location for a ghost to Manifest

name: Deepen Shadows
description: Apply Poor Light Tilt in area

name: Forensic Gaze
description: Learn how a subject died

reaches.effect: Witness final moments of a corpse's life

name: Shadow Sculpting
description: Shape shadows to your liking

name: Soul Marks
description: Learn about a subject’s soul

reaches.effect: Can use spell on unattached souls

name: Speak with the Dead
description: Sense and communicate with ghosts in Twilight. Sense anchors and determine a ghost’s rank

reaches.effect: See if an anchor is temporary or permanent
Can be understood by ghosts that don't share your language

name: Corpse Mask
description: Alter a corpse's apparent time and cause of death

reaches.effect: Can cast this spell on injured living subjects
Change corpse appearance completely even age and sex

name: Decay
description: Age an object, lowering durability

name: Ectoplasm
description: Create ectoplasm from your own orifices or that of a corpse

name: Ghost Shield
description: Protects subject from ghostly Numina, Influences and Manifestations as well as Death-Based entities

reaches.effect: protect from physical attacks of Ghosts

name: Sacrificial Relinquishment
description: Instead of spending a willpower dot to relinquish a spell you may instead make a blood sacrifice. This must be a sacrifice of Value…

name: Shape Ephemera
description: Shape ephemera into objects, weapons or armor.

name: Soul Armor
description: Protect soul against hostile spells

name: Soul Jar
description: Trap unattached soul into container

reaches.effect: Bind soul to person with the soulless condition

name: Suppress Aura
description: Suppress Nimbus to appear as a sleeper

name: Suppress Life
description: Appear to be a corpse

name: Touch of the Grave
description: Interact with ghosts and other things in Death-attuned Twilight

name: Without a Trace
description: Leave no forensic evidence like fingerprints

name: Cold Snap
description: Apply Ice Tilt to area

name: Damage Ghost
description: Deal bashing damage to ghost

name: Death Touched Item
description: Turns ordinary objects into one capable of affecting Death-attuned ephemera

name: Devouring the Slain
description: Can take Willpower or Scour the pattern of an injured person

reaches.effect: Spell does not count toward limit of Scouring per day

name: Ghost Gate
description: Create a 2D gateway to Death-attuned Twilight

name: Ghost Summons
description: Call a ghost

name: Reaping Relinquishment
description: Destroy a soul to relinquish a spell safely instead of spending Willpower

name: Quicken Corpse
description: Create a zombie

name: Quicken Ghost
description: Boost or heal ghost

name: Rotting Flesh
description: Inflict bashing damage

name: Sever Soul
description: Take the soul from a Sleeper

name: Shadow Crafting
description: Shape shadows into objects

name: Unliving Vessel
description: Prepare a Subject for Imbue Item Attainment

name: Enervation
description: Apply Leg or Arm Wrack Tilt

name: Exorcism
description: Destroy Manifestation Condition + Mind 2: works on Goetia

name: Goetic Evocatuion (Death Substitute)
description: May convert psyche pieces into a Ghost

name: Haunted Grimoire
description: Bind a Ghost to a grimoire

name: Revenant
description: Grant a ghost a Manifestation Condition + Mind 4: works on Goetia

name: Scribe Daimonomikon
description: Scribe Legacy tome

name: Shadow Flesh
description: Transform subject into shadow

name: Soul Grafting
description: Graft another Mage's soul stone

name: Withering
description: Inflict lethal damage

name: Create Anchor
description: Apply the Anchor Condition

name: Create Avernian Gate
description: Gateway to Underworld

name: Create Ghost
description: Create Rank 1 ghost

name: Deny the Reaper
description: Reverse decay and age

name: Empty Presence
description: Erase evidence of existence

name: Sever the Awakened Soul
description: Sever soul, inflict Soulless

name: Interconnections
description: Reveal sympathetic connections

name: Oaths Fulfilled
description: Know when the subject breaks or fulfills an oath

name: Quantum Flux
description: Negate penalties or delay for bonus

name: Reading the Outmost Eddies
description: Minor twist of fate in 24h

name: Serendipity
description: Reveal best course of action

name: Exceptional Luck
description: Subject receives a boon or hex

name: Fabricate Fortune
description: Conceal and falsify fate

name: Fools Rush In
description: No untrained penalty

name: Lucky Number
description: Guess codes on first try

name: Malleable Thorns
description: Hedge alters paradigm to fulfill goal

name: Shifting the Odds
description: Find desired object within 24h

name: Warding Gesture
description: Protect fate

name: Grave Misfortune
description: Next damage increased

name: Monkey's Paw
description: Bless/curse an object

name: Shared Fate
description: Link damage/tilts between subjects

name: Superlative Luck
description: Gain Rote quality

name: Sworn Oaths
description: Enforce vow

name: The Right Tool
description: Enhance object as needed tool

name: Wyrdbound Oaths
description: Fae-backed oaths

name: Atonement
description: If a subject is cursed, grant them a quest that, if fulfilled, will lift the curse. Stronger curses require greater quests

reaches.effect: Quest can be undertaken by another on the subject's behalf

name: Chaos Mastery
description: Manipulate complex probabilities within subject or area, dictating physically possible outcomes, no matter how unlikely

name: Divine Intervention
description: Replace one of the subject's Aspirations with a stated goal. Subject suffers ill luck when not pursuing this goal; can be reversed for bad luck only when pursuing the goal

name: Masking the False Fae
description: Allow Changelings to make Goblin Contracts with supernal entities. Releasing Paradox or on a critical failure, the contract is made with an abyssal being

name: Scribe Daimonomikon
description: Scribe a Daimonomikon for the Mage's Legacy. A Mage must be Gnosis 2+; initiations via this require 1 Arcane Experience

name: Strings of Fate
description: Encourage a specific event to befall the subject. Opportunities appear once a week

name: Sever Oaths
description: Free bound ephemeral entities or dispel conditional triggers

name: Forge Destiny
description: Grant the subject a supernatural merit or modify existing ones. Mage can impose Aspirations, Obsessions, or a Doom on the subject

name: Miracle
description: Gain Intercessions to reflexively boost dice or make likely events happen

reaches.effect: Spend an Intercession & Willpower for a low-probability event
Spend Intercession, Willpower & Mana for the incredible

name: Pariah
description: Turn the whole world against the subject

name: Swarm of Locusts
description: Create chaotic Environmental Tilts on the area. This is a breaking point for most Sleepers

name: Influence Electricity
description: Operate or shut down electrical devices

name: Influence Fire
description: Guide flames along a particular path

reaches.effect: Increase or decrease the size of a flame

name: Kinetic Efficiency
description: Run faster, jump further or lift more

name: Influence Heat
description: Control the flow of heat in an area. Can protect against heat- or cold-related Environments up to level 2

reaches.effect: Protect against Environments up to level 3
Protect against Environments up to level 4

name: Nightvision
description: Suffer no penalty from dim to no light. Bright lights can inflict the Blind Condition

reaches.effect: No longer risk the Blind Condition from sudden bright lights

name: Receiver
description: Hear sounds outside normal human frequency

name: Tune In
description: Become able to see and listen to data transmission

name: Control Electricity
description: Alter the flow of a current or decrease it, but you cannot increase it. Direct a building's electricity to one outlet, or divide the power from one outlet to many other sources

name: Control Fire
description: Increase or decrease the heat or size of a fire

name: Control Gravity
description: Cause gravity to pull upwards or horizontally

name: Control Heat
description: Increase or decrease the temperature of an area this may cause an Extreme Environment

name: Control Light
description: Can focus or disperse light, and alter its wavelength

name: Control Sound
description: Amplify or dampen sound, influence direction

name: Control Weather
description: Make changes to the weather may create an Extreme Environment up to level 4

name: Environmental Shield
description: Resistance to Conditions and Tilts caused by the environment

name: Invisibility
description: Make subject invisible

name: Kinetic Blow
description: Unarmed attacks gain a bonus

name: Transmission
description: Hijack existing signals

name: Zoom In
description: See distant or small objects

name: Call Lightning
description: Call lightning from an existing storm

name: Data Hog
description: Increase or decrease a computer device's capability

name: Energize Object
description: Prime object to hold activation spell

name: Gravitic Supremacy
description: Increase or decrease gravity

name: Perpetual Motion
description: Subject no longer requires energy input

name: Rapid Access Memory
description: Imbue software storage activation

name: Telekinesis
description: Lift/manipulate remotely

name: Telekinetic Strike
description: Deal bashing

name: Turn Momentum
description: Deflect objects

name: Velocity Control
description: Increase or decrease speed

name: Electromagnetic Pulse
description: EMP to snuff powered devices

name: Levitation
description: Levitate subject

name: Rend Friction
description: Increase or decrease friction

name: Thunderbolt
description: Deal lethal damage

name: Transform Energy
description: Transform energy types

name: Adverse Weather
description: Create Extreme Environments up to level 4

name: Create Energy
description: Create energy from nothing

name: Eradicate Energy
description: Destroy energy, fatal/spells

name: Earthquake
description: Damage structures/area

name: Analyze Life
description: Observe a creature and learn information like species, age, sex and overall health.

reaches.effect: May learn a specific Physical Attribute level, rather than just the total number of dots

name: Cleanse the Body
description: Help subject resist any toxins in her system

reaches.effect: The subject may make a resistance roll immediately, in addition to the normal ones from regular intervals

name: Heightened Senses
description: Heighten desired senses. Grants bonus to perception roles

name: Speak With Beasts
description: Magically speak with a specific species of animal. Animals have limited ability to understand things around them

reaches.effect: May communicate with all animals rather than only a single species

name: Web of Life
description: Detect all forms of specified life in the spells area of effect

name: Body Control
description: Slow Breathing, Heartbeat and/or Metabolism. Up your Initiative, eliminate or increase body odors and halve healing time for bashing damage

reaches.effect: Half healing time for lethal damage

name: Control Instincts
description: Trigger a specific instinctual response in animals (includes humans). Subject suffers a Condition related to the desired instinct

reaches.effect: Control instincts of living supernatural creatures

name: Lure and Repel
description: Create a lure or repellent that works on a specific organism. Plant and bacteria have 0 resolve for this spell

reaches.effect: Lured creatures may offer food or small favors appropriate for the animal
Lured creatures treat the subject well or poorly based on lure/repellent

name: Mutable Mask
description: Change a subject's appearance, apparent sex, voice, smell, etc.

reaches.effect: Can duplicate the appearance of a specific person, including fingerprints

name: Purge Illness
description: Cure an illness. Compare Potency to the illness rating; reduce or eliminate accordingly

name: Bruise Flesh
description: Deal bashing damage

reaches.effect: Inflict an additional −1 penalty to wound penalties

name: Contact High
description: Creates a drug that targets the nervous system. Affected for one scene

reaches.effect: Living subjects are immune but still spread the drug

name: Degrading the Form
description: Reduce one Physical Attribute

reaches.effect: May affect two different Physical Attributes

name: Honing the Form
description: Raise Strength, Dexterity, or Stamina

name: Knit
description: Heal 2 bashing damage per Potency

reaches.effect: Heal one lethal per Potency instead of 2 bashing

name: Living Vessel
description: Prepare a living subject for Imbue Item attainment

name: Many Faces
description: Like Mutable Mask but changes are real. Add Time 3: Can change physical age

name: Steal Life Force
description: Enchant item to drain Life Force instead of Mana

name: Transform Life
description: Give biological features of other organisms

name: Accelerate Growth
description: Cause rapid growth; aging reverses after Duration

name: Animal Minion
description: Control a creature's body; mage's body inert

name: Life-Force Assault
description: Deal lethal damage

reaches.effect: Spend Mana to deal aggravated damage

name: Living Grimoire
description: Scribe a living being as a Grimoire

name: Mend
description: Heal 2 lethal wounds per Potency

reaches.effect: Spend Mana to heal aggravated damage

name: Regeneration
description: Cost: 1 Mana; restore organs or limbs

name: Shapechanging
description: Transform into another creature +Add Matter 4; +1 Reach; +1 Reach

name: Create Life
description: Design and create life +Add Mind 5: Grant true mind

name: Contagion
description: Create diseases

name: Salt the Earth
description: Destroy life-force; create Extreme Environment

name: Craftsmen's Eye
description: Study an object for one turn to learn its intended function +Add Fate 1: Name a task to reveal all objects that could help

name: Detect Substance
description: Become aware of a chosen type of substance in the area +Add Time 1: Determine if object has been here +Add Forces 1: Search for electronic info

name: Discern Composition
description: Learn an object’s precise makeup +Add Space 2: Trace material’s source

name: Lodestone
description: Draw or repel chosen objects/substances

name: Remote Control
description: Control a mechanical object

name: Alchemist's Touch
description: Become immune to a material’s deleterious effects +Add Forces 2: Protect against extreme temperature

name: Find the Balance
description: Improve an item’s balance, granting 9‑Again

name: Hidden Hoard
description: Hide matter; mundane searches fail, supernatural Clashes

name: Machine Invisibility
description: Invisible to mechanical sensors

name: Shaping
description: Shape liquids & gases

name: Aegis
description: For each level of Potency grant one armor/defense mod

name: Alter Conductivity
description: Make objects more/less conductive

reaches.effect: Other energy types per extra Reach

name: Alter Integrity
description: Increase or decrease an object’s Durability +1 Reach: +2 structure

name: Crucible
description: Grant a tool 8‑Again; boost Availability

name: Hone the Perfected Form
description: Transmute common metal into perfected metal +Forces ●●●: Perfect fire

name: Nigredo and Albedo
description: Repair or damage Structure

name: Shrink and Grow
description: Resize objects +Add Life 3: Affect living subjects

name: Spell Potion
description: Prime ingestible to store spells

name: State Change
description: Shift material along solid–liquid–gas path +Forces 3: Transmute to plasma

name: Windstrike
description: Deal bashing damage

name: Wonderful Machine
description: Integrate multiple machines

name: Endless Bounty
description: Never run out of small expendables

name: Forge Dumanium
description: Combine perfected metals into Dumanium

name: Forge Sophis
description: Combine metals to make Sophis

name: Forge Thaumium
description: Combine metals to create Thaumium +Other Arcanum ●●: Protect against that Arcanum

name: Ghostwall
description: Turn objects intangible +Add Death/Mind/Spirit 3: Shift into Twilight

name: Golem
description: Animate statue +Add Death/Spirit 4 or Mind 5: Intelligence

name: Piercing Earth
description: Deal lethal damage

name: Transubstantiation
description: Transform any matter type +Add Life 4: Living↔matter

name: Annihilate Matter
description: Destroy matter completely

name: Ex Nihilo
description: Create an object or tool ex nihilo

name: Self-Repairing Machine
description: Machine heals Structure per day

name: Know Nature
description: Determine a subject's Virtue, Vice, and Mental/Social Attribute levels

name: Mental Scan
description: Ask questions about a subject's mental or emotional state

name: One Mind, Two Thoughts
description: Perform two Mental or Social extended tasks simultaneously

name: Perfect Recall
description: Recall old memories with perfect accuracy

name: Alter Mental Pattern
description: Add to Subterfuge; surface-thought/emotion reads provoke Clash

name: Dream Reaching
description: Enter a subject's dream

name: Emotional Urging
description: Trigger a specific instinctual response

name: First Impressions
description: Raise or lower the first impression

name: Incognito Presence
description: Hide a subject's Psychic Presence; supernatural perception provokes Clash

name: Memory Hole
description: Hide or erase specific memories (one per Potency)

name: Mental Shield
description: Protect from Mental Attacks;

name: Narcissus' Mirror
description: Reflect Nimbus tilts back with a Clash; modifiers via Life/Prime add multiple tilt types

name: Physic Domination
description: Send one-word commands

name: Ritual Focus
description: Link mage and subjects in ritual; Secondary actors add Potency to ritual pool

name: Soul Windows
description: Project senses through Soul Stone; +Reaches for voice/hologram projections

name: Telepathy
description: Share surface thoughts

name: Astral Grimoire
description: Scribe a Rote in an Astral Grimoire

name: Augment Mind
description: Increase a Mental/Social Attribute by Potency

name: Befuddle
description: Lower Mental/Social Attributes by Potency

name: Broken Relinquishment
description: Create a breaking point to relinquish spells without WP

name: Clear Thoughts
description: Suppress one Mental Condition or Tilt per Potency

name: Enhance Skill
description: Increase a Skill by Potency

name: Give Me That
description: Evoke Obsession Condition via item. +Space ●●●: Strong sympathetic link.

name: Goetic Summons
description: Call nearest Goetia +multi-Reaches for Open, commands, summon from Oneiros/Temenos/Anima Mundi

name: Imposter
description: Cause subjects to believe the caster is someone else

name: Psychic Assault
description: Deal Bashing damage equal to Potency

name: Sleep of the Just
description: Control sleep cycle and dreams

name: Supernal Translation
description: Translate High Speech in real time

name: Read the Depths
description: Read subconscious memories

name: Universal Language
description: Understand any language (spoken, written, body, thoughts)

name: Haunted Grimoire
description: Bind a Goetia to a Grimoire

name: Possession
description: Possess a subject (+Possessed Condition)

name: Gain Skill
description: Increase a Skill by Potency

name: Goetic Evocatuion
description: Convert psyche pieces to a Goetia

name: Hallucination
description: Create a multi-sensory illusion

name: Mind Flay
description: Deal Lethal damage

name: Psychic Projection
description: Project into Twilight or dreams +Add Spirit 2: project into Shadow

name: Psychic Reprogramming
description: Alter memories, virtues, aspirations

name: Scribe Daimonomikon
description: Scribe Legacy tome

name: Terrorize
description: Inflict Insensate Tilt

name: Amorality
description: Remove Virtue or Vice; alters Willpower mechanics

name: No Exit
description: Subject enters catatonic state

name: Mind Wipe
description: Erase spans of memory

name: Psychic Genesis
description: Create a Rank1 Goetia in Twilight

name: Social Networking
description: Gain Allies/Contacts/Status dots per Potency

name: Dispel Magic
withstand: Arcanum rating of the subject spell’s caster
description: Temporarily suppress or destroy an active spell +Add Fate 1: Selectively suppress spell

name: Nimbus Tuning
description: Tune more attentively to any Signature Nimbus; learn one detail per Potency

name: Pierce Deception
description: See through magical and mundane falsehoods

name: Sacred Geometry
description: Reveal ley lines and nodes +Add Death 1 or Spirit 1: See Gates/Loci

name: Scribe Grimoire
description: Create or transcribe a Grimoire of Rotes +Add Forces ●●: No equipment

name: Shared Mage Sight
description: Share your Mage sight with another Mage; costs 1+ Mana per Arcanum

name: Supernal Signature
description: Imprint your Supernal identity on a subject’s Nimbus; boosts social impression

name: Supernal Vision
description: Perceive Supernal properties

name: Word of Command
description: Bypass triggers to activate magical effects +Add Any Other Arcanum 1: Activate multi‑Arcanum items

name: As Above, So Below
description: Empower Yantras with 9‑Again

name: Cloak Nimbus
description: Veil your Nimbus and emotional state; active attempts provoke a Clash

name: Fractured Grimoire
description: Split a Grimoire into meaningless pieces

name: Invisible Runes
description: Leave High Speech messages only visible to Mage sight

name: Light Under a Bushel
description: Add Potency to the number of rolls before your Nimbus leaks

name: Nimbus Forgery
description: Disguise your Nimbus as one you’ve studied

name: Path to Jerusalem
description: Increase Mystery’s Opacity

name: Supernal Veil
description: Veil supernatural phenomena from Peripheral Mage Sight

name: Sustain Nimbus
description: Prevent a studied Nimbus from fading

name: Wards and Signs
description: Withstand Potency on any direct spell

name: Words of Truth
description: All hear and believe your true statements; may remove Doors or improve Impressions

name: Aetheric Winds
description: Attack with shrieking aetheric wind

reaches.effect: Destroy target’s Mana instead of damage

name: Camera Obscura
description: *Cost 1 Mana* Enchant a recording device to capture Supernal Energies

name: Channel Mana
description: Move Mana equal to Potency between vessels

name: Cleanse Pattern
description: Remove dramatic failure of a Mage Sight Revelation and a Signature Nimbus

name: Display of Power
description: Make Imagos visible to all Active Mage Sight +Add Fate •: Reveal fae clauses

name: Ephemeral Enchantment
description: Subject becomes solid to Twilight entities

name: Geomancy
description: Move ley lines and change Node Resonance

name: Imbue Room
description: Prepare a room for Imbue Item attainment

name: Mana Battery
description: Prime an item to store Mana for Imbue Item

name: Platonic Form
description: Create a simple construct from Mana

name: Primary Subject
description: Enchant an item to always target the user

name: Reveal Marks
description: Reveal all signature Nimbus associated with a subject

name: Scribe Palimpsest
description: Recreate a single rote’s symbols in a blank Grimoire

name: Spirit Vessel
description: Prepare a Spirit for Imbue Item attainment

name: Steal Mana
description: Enchant item to siphon Mana from its user

name: Stealing Fire
description: Temporarily turn Sleeper into a Sleepwalker

name: Stored Spell
description: Make an item capable of holding unactivated spells

name: Apocalypse
description: Grant a Sleeper your Mage Sight +1 Reach & Add Any Other Arcanum 1: Add that Arcanum’s Sight

name: Celestial Fire
description: Attack spell inflicts Lethal = Potency

name: Destroy Tass
description: Destroy Tass; releases its Mana

name: Hallow Dance
description: Suppress or awaken a Hallow

name: Primal Transfer
description: Transfer spell control of your spells

name: Scribe Daimonomikon
description: Scribe a Daimonomikon

name: Supernal Dispellation
description: Suppress target spell +Add Fate 1: Selective

name: Transfer Soul Stone
description: Transfer a Soul Stone between objects

name: Blasphemy
description: Sever connection to the Supernal in an area

name: Create Truth
description: Create a Hallow

name: Eidolon
description: Create an animate Tass +Add Forces ●●●: Not obviously magical +Add Mind ●●●●●: Give a mind

name: Forge Purpose
description: Grant a subject one of your Obsessions

name: Word of Unmaking
description: Destroy a magical item

name: Correspondence
description: Learn one of a subject’s sympathetic links per Potency. Oldest/strongest first; if nearby, learn exact location

reaches.effect: Follow link to its other end

name: Ground Eater
description: Add or reduce Speed by Potency. Speed cannot go below 1

name: Isolation
description: Any attempt to interact with others costs a Willpower point and penalizes dice by Potency. Prolonged exposure causes breaking points or Conditions like Shaken/Spooked

name: Locate Object
description: Find subject in spell area

reaches.effect: Track subject if it leaves the area

name: The Outward and Inward Eye
description: Gain 360° vision and hearing; negate ambush, reduce range/cover/concealment penalties by Potency

name: Borrow Threads
description: Transfer a number of sympathetic connections equal to Potency; caster must know links

name: Break Boundary
description: Allows subject to slip past obstacles

name: Lying Maps
description: Make subject certain a chosen path leads to a destination

name: Scrying
description: Remotely view a distant location; may cast spells through the scrying window +Add Fate 2: Restrict viewers

name: Secret Door
description: Hide a passageway from mundane perception

name: Veil Sympathy
description: Conceal one of the subject’s sympathetic connections

name: Ward
description: Prevent space manipulation in an area

name: Ban
description: Seal off an area from outside phenomena +Add Any Arcanum 2: Exclude or limit that Arcanum’s effects

name: Co-Location
description: Overlap multiple locations; perceptive individuals can switch between them

name: Forced Sympathy
description: Alter imbument so spells always target the closest Sympathy Yantra

name: Optimal Container
description: Expand a container’s capacity by Potency beyond its normal size

name: Perfect Sympathy
description: Grant 8‑Again on actions involving Strong sympathies

name: Warp
description: Deal bashing damage by twisting the target’s space

reaches.effect: Apply Arm Wrack or Leg Wrack Tilt

name: Web-Weaver
description: Bolster a sympathetic connection +Add Time 2: Temporal sympathy to touched targets

name: Alter Direction
description: Redefine absolute directions in an area

name: Collapse
description: Force subject and object into same space, dealing lethal damage

name: Cut Threads
description: Destroy a sympathetic connection lasting after spell

reaches.effect: Remove the sympathetic name until spell ends

name: Secret Room
description: Enlarge or shrink a space along the Area Scale Factor by Potency steps

name: Teleportation
description: Teleport subject via Sympathetic Range

name: Create Sympathy
description: Create a new sympathetic connection

name: Forge No Chains
description: Prevent creation of new sympathetic connections; sheds (blood, hair) do not link

name: Pocket Dimension
description: Create a self‑contained space with custom rules +Add Time 2: Normal time flow +Add Death/Mind/Spirit 2: Contains Twilight

name: Quarantine
description: Remove an area from space; neighbors adjust, trapped inside +Add Mind 4: No memory +Add Time 5: Retroactive erasure

name: Unnaming
description: Erase a subject’s sympathetic name and connections +Add Prime •••••: Affect Shadow Name & Nimbus

name: Coaxing the Spirits
description: Compel a Spirit or its physical representation to take a single instant action in accordance with its nature.

name: Exorcist's Eye
description: See and speak with any Spirit in Twilight, slumbering in objects, or possessing someone; see conduits via the Reaching Manifestation +1 Reach: See across the Gauntlet (Withstood by Gauntlet Strength) +Add Death 1 or Mind 1: Extend benefits to ghosts or Goetia.

name: Gremlins
description: Cause a Spirit of an object to hinder its user: each Potency causes one failure to become a dramatic failure +1 Reach: Choose which failures become dramatic.

name: Invoke Bane
description: Force a Spirit to avoid its Bane; it must spend a Willpower to enter the area and cannot touch the Bane. Spirits above Rank 5 are unaffected.

name: Know Spirit
description: Learn facts equal to Potency: name, Rank, Manifestations, Numina, Influences (and strengths), Ban, and Bane.

name: Cap the Well
description: Any attempt to feed from a source of Essence affected by this spell provokes a Clash of Wills.

name: Channel Essence
description: Move Essence equal to Potency (up to Mana‑per‑turn limit); can store Essence in your Pattern. +Add Death 2 or Mind 2: Works on ghosts or Goetia. +1 Reach: Siphon Essence directly from a Spirit (Withstand = Spirit’s Rank).

name: Command Spirit
description: Force a Spirit to undertake up to Potency actions; may abandon incomplete tasks on spell’s end. No effect on Spirits above Rank 5.

name: Ephemeral Shield
description: Spirit Numina, Influences, Manifestations, Spirit spells, and Gifts provoke a Clash of Wills. +1 Reach: Protects against physical attacks. +Add Death 2 or Mind 2: Extends to ghosts or Goetia.

name: Gossamer Touch
description: Interact physically with Spirits in Twilight. +Add Death 2 or Mind 2: Affects ghosts or Goetia. +1 Reach: Carried objects are physical. +1 Reach: Unarmed attacks deal Potency extra damage.

name: Opener of the Way
description: Convert Resonant to Open Condition or vice versa.

name: Shadow Walk
description: Shroud subject from spirits; supernatural detection provokes a Clash of Wills.

name: Slumber
description: Slow a hibernating Spirit’s Essence regain to one point per Potency days.

name: Bolster Spirit
description: Heal a Spirit: two bashing per Potency. +1 Reach: Increase one Attribute by one. +2 Reach: Spend Mana to increase Rank by one.

name: Erode Resonance
description: Remove a subject’s Open or Resonant Condition Lasting. +1 Reach: Future creation of Conditions suffers a penalty equal to Potency.

name: Howl From Beyond
description: Attack: bashing damage equal to Potency. +1 Reach: Open Condition. +1 Reach: Target across the Gauntlet (Withstand = Gauntlet Strength).

name: Place of Power
description: Raise or lower Gauntlet Strength by Potency. +1 Reach: Alter sides independently.

name: Reaching
description: Interact physically/magically across the Gauntlet. +1 Reach: Create an Iris. +1 Reach: Specify key.

name: Rouse Spirit
description: Awaken a Spirit early (Potency equals Essence gap). +1 Reach: Additional Corpus boxes cleared.

name: Spirit Summons
description: Call a Spirit +1 Reach: Creates Open Condition. +1 Reach: One-word command. +1 Reach: From Shadow (Withstand = max Rank/Gauntlet). +2 Reach: Complex command.

name: Spiritual Tool
description: Enhance item for interaction with spirits and Twilight ephemera.

name: Banishment
description: Remove Manifestation Conditions equal to Potency Lasting. +Add Mind 4: Affect Goetia. +Add Death 4: Affect ghosts. +1 Reach: Conditions cannot be reestablished until end.

name: Bind Spirit
description: Grant Manifestation Conditions equal to Potency. +Add Mind 4/Death 4: Affect Goetia/ghosts.

name: Craft Fetish
description: Create a Fetish: item containing a Spirit with Numina/Influences equal to Potency; triggers Ban/Bane destroys it. Non-spirit Fetish holds 10+Potency Essence.

name: Familiar
description: Grant Familiar Merit for duration; both willing. Cannot affect Spirits > Rank 2. +Substitute Death 4 or Mind 4: Bind ghost/Goetia.

name: Haunted Grimoire
description: Bind a Spirit to a grimoire, adding Open and Resonant Conditions.

name: Scribe Daimonomikon
description: Scribe a Daimonomikon for your Legacy +1 Reach: Lasting.

name: Shadow Scream
description: Attack: lethal damage equal to Potency +1 Reach: Aggravated +1 Reach: Essence damage +1 Reach: Open Condition +1 Reach: Across Gauntlet.

name: Shape Spirit
description: Alter a Spirit by Potency effects: Attributes, Corpus, Manifestations, Numina, Ban/Bane, appearance; revert on end +1 Reach: Heal aggravated damage.

name: Twilit Body
description: Turn yourself into Spirit‑attuned ephemera; +1 Reach: Immaterial even outside Twilight.

name: World Walker
description: Transport subject across the Gauntlet without a portal. +1 Reach: Conjured Spirit gains Materialized Condition.

name: Annihilate Spirit
description: Destroy a Spirit; it may resist with Essence+Clash. Cannot affect Spirits > Rank 5.

name: Birth Spirit
description: Create a Rank 1 Spirit +1 Reach: Rank 2.

name: Create Locus
description: Create a Locus at a Resonant site +1 Reach: Generates Essence per day.

name: Essence Fountain
description: Create Essence equal to Potency with chosen Resonance +1 Reach: Multiple Resonances.

name: Spirit Manse
description: Create a Shadow Manse granting Safe Place Merit = Potency +1 Reach: Iris with key (Withstand by Gauntlet).

name: Divination
description: Ask a general question regarding the future with an answer of "Yes", "No" or "Irrelevant"

reaches.effect: More specific questions yield more detailed answers

name: Green Light/Red Light
description: Positively: Helpful events occur exactly when needed. Negatively: Delays occur exactly when harmful.

name: Momentary Flux
description: Determine if the subject will prove beneficial or baneful in the future. Acting on info adds Potency to Initiative

name: Perfect Timing
description: Subject can spend a turn planning, adding Potency to their next instant action

name: Postcognition
description: View a subject’s past from any moment in real time

reaches.effect: Rewind, pause, speed control without losing Defense

name: Choose the Thread
description: Roll twice on your next mundane roll; choose which result applies

reaches.effect: Also affects spellcasting and supernatural rolls

name: Constant Presence
description: Alterations to the timeline that would change you provoke a Clash; if you win, you remain unchanged

name: Hung Spell
description: Hold up to Potency spells in stasis; they do not expire until Hung Spell ends

name: Shield of Chronos
description: Block time‑based scrying;

reaches.effect: Show a false sequence of events instead (Clash to pierce)

name: Tipping the Hourglass
description: Add or subtract Potency from a subject’s Initiative on their next action

name: Veil of Moments
description: Protect a subject from aging, toxins, conditions; +Reaches restore healing, Willpower, Mana, negate Persistent Conditions

name: Acceleration
description: Multiply the subject’s speed by Potency; gain first turn action and dodge defense bonus

name: Chronos' Curse
description: Divide the subject’s speed by Potency and reduce Defense by Potency

name: Shifting Sands
description: Rewind a subject by Potency turns; injuries and resources do not revert

name: Temporal Summoning
description: Restore subject to a younger version; changes revert on end; injuries persist

name: Time Limit
description: Set a time limit on an imbued spell equal to one week per Potency

reaches.effect: Increase to one month per Potency

name: Weight of Years
description: Deal bashing equal to Potency; structural damage on objects

name: Present as Past
description: Subject can act anywhere in the Initiative order; social Doors removed equal to Potency

name: Prophecy
description: Ask a series of “what if?” questions equal to Potency

name: Rend Lifespan
description: Inflict lethal damage equal to Potency

name: Rewrite History
description: Rewrite recent decisions; reverts on end

name: Temporal Stutter
description: Project subject forward in time; reappear causing Knocked Down if clash for space

name: Blink of an Eye
description: Turn the next extended action into an instant with Potency rolls in a single turn

name: Corridors of Time
description: Embed the caster in their past self to change history; changes become Lasting on catch-up

name: Temporal Pocket
description: Freeze the world around the subject; they can move freely until interaction ends the spell
